0.description: Actually think leveins got a chance tonight #notabadteam

2.description: The sight of Craig Levein makes me want to punch myself in the dick repeatedly

5.description: Commons and Fletcher start, if Levein back tracks any more he'll be back in his maw.

6.description: Hope we qualify for the world cup under Craig Levein to shut everyone up! #teamlevein

11.description: Craig Levein is such a hypocrite!

16.description: Can wait til Stevie Fletch scores so he can run over to Levein n get it up the cunt!!

17.description: #skysports. Levein now been upgraded to 'stand by' for Brussels flight by SFA travel department.

19.description: 'If Levein could've picked a player!?' he tried his fucking best not to.

20.description: Levein needs to change it at half time. He's got a Fox marking an ape FFS

21.description: Levein needs to make some tactical changes in defence in a bid to out Fox Bale!

22.description: Some absolute roasters calling for Leveins head when we are winning

23.description: Make a change Levein. We are getting ran all over the top of us

24.description: Levein needs to make a change here. Put Mulgrew in the midfield and have him half Bale every chance he gets...

25.description: What the fuck was Fletcher's goal disallowed for? Levein must have bribed the referee.

26.description: nothing more than Scotland deserve. went one up and sat back. classic shitey Levein tactics once more!

27.description: Levein is a shitebag he's scared to make a sub! Why is mulgrew no playin is he injured

28.description: bittersweet moment of Wales scoring there. hate to see us lose, would love for Levein to get to fuck!

29.description: Fuck coupons. Fuck Gareth Bale. Fuck Craig Levein.

30.description: If Levein doesn't get sacked after this game then the SFA are just a bunch of arseholes #Leveinout #sfa

38.description: Pathetic from Charlie Adam there. Great strike but game shouldn't be here - ref's choked and gifted it to Wales. Still, Levein out now

39.description: Charlie Adam can get in the taxi wi levein!!!

40.description: Charlie adam kicks him bale does that what a goal wel deserved c u at the dole office levein #FuckTheSFA

42.description: Take a bow Gareth Bale! Levein out!

43.description: Time for levein to get tae. Canny even beat this shower

44.description: :-( RT @Martin1Williams Goodbye WorldCup. Goodbye Mr Levein. Bale scores.  #Wales 2 1 #Scotland 88m

45.description: Levein can get to fuck. Fucking ruining scotland.

47.description:
Now I feel even worse. #Wales 2 #Scotland 1.
We can't blame THIS game on Levein. Outdone by one moment of cheating, and one moment of class.

48.description: Oh well, let's hope Levein gets the boot now.

49.description: Levein must be close to the axe now.

50.description: Thats all that specky wee mongo levein deserves. This is why I dont give a shit about scotland.

51.description: 3 games in and Brazil in 2014 is already over. 2 abysmal decisions play their part but get Levein to fuck

52.description: Only decent thing about tonights result is levein's gone now.

53.description: But in all serious Craig levein is a fucking kermit the frog sounding pelican #cunt

63.description: Worst thing is, I don't think we can blame Levein here tonight. Ridiculous dive and even worse defending has led to this defeat.

64.description: Leveins wife is as wet as his suit at the prospect pf havin her husband at home 365 days a year #gettinthesack

65.description: Please sack Craig Levein...this is all I want.

70.description: Cheerio Rio! 2 qualifying campaigns for Levein as Scotland boss, both destined to end in abject failure. Hard not to feel angry & depressed.

71.description: Craig Levein is a complete and utter arrogant twit that should immediately resign

72.description: Ah well, not Levein's fault tonight.

76.description: Good Bye Craig Levein, there's a job at Poundland in the Kingsgate 👍

77.description: That is disgusting, still Levein will come out and spraf shite excuses.

78.description: Gareth Bale - cheat, World class cheat, but a cheat. On the bright side. Levein, surely this is your last week in charge of your ego fest

79.description: How many points off of top are Scotland now Levein?

81.description: Craig levein is signing on the dole in the morning

82.description: Sack craig levein useless negative hun loving fucking ballsack #yourgettingsackedinthemorning ! Fuck you

83.description: As much as I have slated Levein that was in no way down to him. He got it right with tactics, we were robbed there by the diving twat Bale

84.description: Charlie Adam puffing a cigar while tracking bale... Levein is toast.

85.description: might b a job goin at sevco for mr levein

86.description: Get the feeling that Craig Levein can't motivate his players, doesn't seem to have a personality

87.description: See if levein says it's not over, I swear I'll trash the TV.

88.description: FT Wales 2 Scotland 1 A late Bale double sends d Scots into misery & Levein towards d gallows.

89.description: BYE BYE CRAIG LEVEIN, THANKS FOR GIVING SCOTLAND A SHIT NAME!

91.description: Levein's post is simply untenable. We need a new manager, preferably foreign, to use these dead rubbers in preparation for Euro qualifying.

92.description: Gordon strachan take charge !!! Miller levein and hutton jog on past it!

93.description: I am disgusted and ashamed to be Scottish right now. Fuck off Levein and take your horrible negative tactics with you, you clueless cunt

95.description: Maybe that's a blessing in disguise and will be a kick up the arse the SFA need to sack that idiot Levein

96.description: Craig Levein deserves to get the sack defo a #worstcunt

97.description: Sadly, Craig Levein just isn't liked. Maybe his last throw of the dice. Too many people suggesting he's done, with lots of games left.

98.description: And so the pressure cranks up, can Levein survive what was a totally inept second half performance?

99.description: World Cup dreams are dashed. See you Levein, ye twat.

100.description: Not sure how you blame Levein for that shambles #CharlieAdamwtf

101.description: Taxi for levein ! #leveinmustgo supporting germany now #reus

103.description: We were crap, the ref was a joke and Gareth Bale cheated us. And the SFA will probably wuss out of sacking Levein. I COULDN'T BE MORE ANGRY

104.description: Fuck you Craig levein away and take a flying fuck to yourself

105.description: Levein out, Black Wallace Mcculloch and Templeton in

107.description: #leveinmustgo tactically unaware. Muppet. Bye bye Levein.

108.description: Another great result for Scotland..Levein has to go! Utter pish

109.description: Levein has to go so embarrassed #leavebeforeyougetsacked

110.description: Time to go Levein, piss poor performance yet again against a poor Wales team...one disaster after another with him as manager

111.description: craig levein better be getting sacked #GettingSackedInTheMorning

112.description: I have no idea how people can blame Craig Levein when we clearly won that game 2-0 if everybody got what was due to them.

113.description: Levein can survive this time surely!

114.description: Taxi for levein! scottish football has been jobs for the boys for to long #getthemallout

115.description: Bale is a diver but we knew that anyway, another shocking result must mean Levein has to go

116.description: Two sacked managers, Levein and trapattoni

118.description:
The man who appointed levein should be out a job aswell
#RegansXI

119.description: I would sack Levein right now and give Gordon Strachan the job!!

120.description: Hopes of Brazil over just two months into qualifying. Levein has never, ever convinced at international level. No chance he'll resign though

121.description: With the exception of Bale, how on Earth did we lose? How naive is Levein with tactics or has he simply lost the dressing room? #Levein2go

122.description: It seems Levein can't pick his nose, never mind a team, leave before you do cause anymore damage ya bam! #LeveinOut

124.description: No question, Levein's pushed his luck. If your the head of a company & it fails your sacked straight away! too many chances! #LeveinOut

125.description: You know what the scary thing is, the SFA won’t sack Levein, it will cost them money to do that.

126.description: Comment feed on BBC re. Wal-Sco amusing. Many 'Levein Out' comments, but the first 'Strachan In' has arrived. McLeish will get shout soon.

127.description: Levein out, my blind cat in.

128.description: I just want to run to Wales and stab bale in the legs and stab levein in the eyes!! #raging

129.description: The only words I want to hear from levein is, i resign, after tonight's performance yes there was chances but simply not good enough!

130.description: Levein has to go now.  Give a new man the rest of the group! Get rid of the dead wood and we start again! #Scotland #SFA

131.description: Scotland will get a new manager and we will go through the same saga as we are currently with Levein and nothing will change.

132.description: Levein certainty to now depart but bigger picture is where do Scotland go from here? European obscurity in pot 6 awaits.

133.description: Levein has to get the sack #leveinout

135.description: If Levein played that team for the other games it wouldn't be this bad we'd have 6 points at least

136.description: Levein deserves the sack simply for starting with Danny Fox & then having no Plan B when Bale was running Fox ragged. Mulgrew had to come on

137.description: That's why bale should be playin for #united n levein got his tactics wrong in the 2nd half!!! #Leveinout #walterforscotland

138.description: Soft penalty and a terrible decision from the assistant referee 'Hagar the Horrible', but for me Levein shd have shut #Bale out of the game.

139.description: I hope #Levein at least comes out and shows some emotion and says we were cheated. If you're going to go down at least do it with passion.

140.description: Levein says 'I'm determined to do my best in the situation'. You have Craig, and it was really shit, so go away, thank you.

141.description: Gutted, our campaign over after 3 games. Even if we spanked Belgium 10-0 Levein's gotta go.

142.description: Said it after the last game, levein, houston and black, average players at best. What chance ye got?

143.description: A think levein's time is up, would give Gordon Strachan a chance now.....

144.description: I wish Stone Cold Steve Austin was doing the interview with Levein. "We're making progress." BAM! Stunner.

145.description: exactly Levein, at least someone's saying as it is, Wales weren't dominant at all, they weren't fantastic, why is everyone saying it.

146.description: Levein you can't blame refs for the failure to qualify for a tournament in 7 attempts. Just not good enough at the end of the day.

147.description: Levein on my tv n I'm so tempted to kick him #Scotland

148.description: Didn't see the game (which shows my feelings for Levein and the team under him) but I hear that there was a dodgy pen but we were shocking

149.description: Levein said we can win 10 and we've lost 3 out of 3... #LeveinOut
